casebody.data:
Daniel WALKER and Nancy Walker, Plaintiffs-Appellees,
v.
WILLIAM BEAUMONT HOSPITAL and Said Hafez Khayyata, M.D., Defendants-Appellants. SC: 158957
COA: 337824 Supreme Court of Michigan. March 8, 2019

Order

On order of the Chief Justice, the motion of defendants-appellants to extend the time for filing their reply is GRANTED. The reply will be accepted as timely filed if submitted on or before March 18, 2019.
